data.title: Gentry Lee Burke on LinkedIn: Fans of enchanting tales and captivating romance are in for a treat as…
data.meta_description: Fans of enchanting tales and captivating romance are in for a treat as Gentry Lee Burke's acclaimed novel, "Betrothed to the Zombie Prince," is set to hit…
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

Fans of enchanting tales and captivating romance are in for a treat as Gentry Lee Burke's acclaimed novel, "Betrothed to the Zombie Prince," is set to hit Audible midsummer. This gripping fairy tale retelling, filled with love, adventure, and a touch of the supernatural, promises to enthrall fans and audiobook listeners in a whole new way. One of the most anticipated aspects of this Audible release is the exceptional narration by the talented voice actor Abigail Linhart. With her captivating voice and remarkable storytelling skills, Linhart brings to life the characters and the enchanting world of "Betrothed to the Zombie Prince" in a way that will immerse listeners in every twist and turn of the story. About "Betrothed to the Zombie Prince": In a world overrun by the undead, a peculiar love story unfolds between Maeve, a courageous young woman, and Prince Alaric, a cursed soul trapped in a monstrous form. As they navigate the challenges of an apocalyptic zombie invasion, their unexpected connection sparks a journey of rediscovering humanity and resilience in the face of adversity. About the Author: Gentry Lee Burke is a Kindle Vella fan favorite serial novelist, known for blending romance, fantasy, and adventure in her captivating storytelling. "Betrothed to the Zombie Prince" is one of her most beloved works, captivating readers with its unique take on love amidst a dystopian world.
